document.full_text: u.s. chipmaker broadcom corp expects near-field communications (nfc) wireless technology to be a main revenue driver in coming years, a senior executive said on tuesday, when it becomes more of a norm for consumers use their handphones to make payments.
document.title: broadcom sees nfc technology as future main revenue driver
